==== `with()` ====

{{{
nulltype with(callable ctorcall, callable block)
}}}

  # Executes `ctorcall` and stores the object reference returned
  # Calls `__enter__()` method on the object returned by `ctorcall`
  # Calls `block` passing the object returned by `ctorcall` as parameter
  # Calls `__exit__()` method on the object returned by `ctorcall`

Example

{{{
with(function() { return new Example(); }, function($ex) {
    print_r($ex);
});
}}}
